entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • runtime-wasm-perf pipeline running on markdown only changes #93836
  • Consider adding activities for potentially long running network operations #93832
  • TimeSpan.FromSeconds #93831
    Future
  • ReadOnlyDictionary Keys/Values property does not reflect changes if underlying Dictionary is a ConcurrentDictionary and was used one time before #93829
  • required member that hides base required member is not recognized #93826
  • [API Proposal]: `WasmImportAttribute` to control wasm module names #93824
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.BindCanReadStaticProperty failing intermittently #86532
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add Int128 and UInt128 `BitConverter.GetBytes` support #80337
  • `initblk` Performance Degradation in `.NET 5+` compared to `.NET Framework` #93825
  • EnumConverter ignores naming policy for property names on deserialization #93765
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Make FailFast blocks cold" #93835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold "X >= 0 && X < NN" to "X u< NN" #93834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix GitHub_93597 test build #93833
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Clean up GenTreeCallFlags, remove INLINE_DATA define #93830
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Console cleanup #93828
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Proposal to add WasmImportAttribute to control wasm module names #93823
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 9.0.0

Merged

  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 118.0.5993.88, windows: 118.0.5993.89 #93822
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: stop creating gc poll blocks in morph #93816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose BitConverter APIs for Int128 and UInt128 #93817
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix configuration test #93786
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Honor naming policy of JsonStringEnumConverter on dictionary key deserialization. #93792
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0

Updated

  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add `WidenLatin1ToUtf16_MisalignedAddress` #90319
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Use AVX512 intrinsics for number conversion when possible #89330
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • CoreCLR: vm: arm: Fix gcc arm asm build error #86692
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve performance of UnmanagedMemoryStream #93812
    area-System.IO
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Abstract out LocalBuilder, emit Locals with new ILGenerator #93809
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add initial MaxStack calculation #93244
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Interlocked intrinsic improvements #93821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Referencing a .net7.0-windows project from a net7.0 project when ReferenceOutputAssembly == false results in build error #36352

PullRequests

Created

  • APICompat & GenAPI clean-up #36353
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix emsdk dep for stable version #36340
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [#17005] Make Mistyping Errors Gentler #35939
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "paramref" XML attribute doesn't work with primary constructor params (CS1734) #70509

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34004.299 #69408
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34003.103 #69363
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34002.289 #69347
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33919.229 #69113

PullRequests

Updated

  • Pascal and camel case should not allow underscores -- unless "_" is set as word_separator #70506
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • EnC: Fix emit for anonymous indexed delegates #70501
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Add support for \e escape sequences in c# strings and characters #70497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary casts. #70504
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Classify suffixes of numerical literals as keywords #70507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fluent-UI or MudBlazor Interactivity fix breaks SigninManager #51554
  • Issue with not nullable generic and nullable property #51553
  • Provide a loadBootResource code example working with Brotoli and taking into account correctly the environment! #51552
  • GitHub Action block on dotnet test with multiple WebApplicationFactory #51551
  • IEndpointAddressScheme (RouteValuesAddressScheme) FindEndpoints returns incorrect Endpoint in ASP.NET Core MVC (both 6 and 7) #51549
  • RequestDelegateGenerator "From" Attributes in AsParameters class produces compile error #51547
  • user-jwts does not support different Name and NameIdentifier claim #51546
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plaintext #51544

Closed

  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, plaintext, plaintext #51530
  • Perf regression: single_query #51531
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #51539
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51540

PullRequests

Created

  • add data-nosnippet attribute to MainLayout razor pages #51543
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Timed out when dotnet-trace connects to a dotnet app #3479
    8.0.0
  • Add source file names and line numbers to the output of dotnet-stack #2776
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setting .NET MAUI Button.Text to String.Empty inside a Clicked event handler causes previously set buttons to revert to previous values #18235
  • [Bug] [Android] Opacity not set at startup #18234
  • MAUI Templates not found after install #18232
  • Code Signing Error with Xcode 15+ #18231
  • [Maui][Android][.NET8 RC2] Signature/MAC verification failed #18230
  • Mixed Content Issue in WebView WinForms: Blocked Request to Insecure Resource #18229

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fixes iOS Elastic Scrolling #6689 #17963
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18122
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is it possible to configure an IReadOnlyCollection<T> where T is Keyless? #32127
  • Strong typing names in data annotations during reverse engineering where possible #32126

Closed

  • Carbonates karrot in design que; possibly not query"absentia #32121

PullRequests

Created

  • Use OrderedDictionary or Dictionary instead of SortedDictionary in RuntimeModel #32124

Issues

PullRequests

Updated

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Use stable package for emsdk versions #17389
